source.4e32260d:
def generateWordcloud(text,title):
    india_mask=np.array(Image.open('/kaggle/input/indiamap6/indiamap6.png'))
 
    from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS
    stopwords = set(STOPWORDS)
    wc = WordCloud(background_color='white', mask=india_mask, mode='RGB',
               width=500, max_words=1000, height=500,
               random_state=1, contour_width=1, contour_color='steelblue')
    wc.generate(text)
    plt.figure(figsize=(5, 5))
    plt.imshow(wc, interpolation='bilinear')
    plt.tight_layout(pad=0)
    plt.title(title)
    plt.axis('off')
    return plt

source.82456048: The number of vegerarian dishes in India are far greater than non veg dishes.
source.8159cca2: There are no NaN values in the dataframe except in the region column
source.c0d700a6: The average prep time of non veg dishes is 27.06 and of veg dishes is 31.62. Looks like the average prep time of non veg dishes is less than that of veg dishes.
source.fdbb7a76: There are 2 Numerical columns and 7 categorical columns in the dataframe.

source.1b299b9d: All the rows with region value NaN or -1 have been removed.
source.7e47e877: The average cook time of non veg dishes is 25.86 while the average cook time of veg dishes is 35.64. Looks like the time taken to cook vegetarian dishes is much more than the time taken to cook nonveg dishes.
